thread.title: Bruce Lee audio launch confirmed on October 2
thread.title_full: Bruce Lee audio launch confirmed on October 2 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bruce Lee audio launch confirmed on October 2
text: Ram Charan is fast finishing the shooting of his upcoming action entertainer, Bruce Lee, in the direction of Srinu Vaitla. The current schedule is progressing in Hyderabad. Rakul Preet Singh is the female lead in the film. As per the official announcement, the film's audio launch event will be held on the 2nd of October. The venue will be confirmed very soon. Also, the makers made it clear that the film will hit the screens on October 16th. SS Thaman is the music composer for the film.
